item.title: EP 436 - The Cryptids Of North Korea
item.itunes:title: The Cryptids Of North Korea
item.description:
Today we hang out in Korea and ride “unicorns,” meet spooky ghosts, and then paint our house in blood!

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
